# auto-generated by grc.converter

id: pdu_utils_pdu_preamble
label: PDU Preamble F
category: '[Sandia]/PDU Utilities'

parameters:
-   id: preamble
    label: Preamble
    dtype: raw
    default: numpy.array([])
-   id: tail
    label: Tail
    dtype: raw
    default: numpy.array([])
-   id: interp
    label: Interpolation
    dtype: int
    default: '1'
-   id: zero_pad
    label: Pad Size
    dtype: int
    default: '0'
-   id: nrz
    label: Encoding
    dtype: bool
    default: 'True'
    options: ['False', 'True']
    option_labels: [None, NRZ]
    hide: part

inputs:
-   domain: message
    id: pdu_in

outputs:
-   domain: message
    id: pdu_out
    optional: true
asserts:
- ${ interp >= 1 }
- ${ zero_pad >= 0 }

templates:
    imports: |-
        import pdu_utils
        import numpy
    make: pdu_utils.pdu_preamble(${preamble}, ${tail}, ${interp}, ${zero_pad}, ${nrz})
    callbacks:
    - set_preamble(${preamble})
    - set_tail(${tail})
    - set_interp(${interp})
    - set_pad(${zero_pad})
    - set_nrz(${nrz})

file_format: 1
